src:
Winning numbers drawn in 'Numbers Midday' game
02 Nov 2019, 17:10 by The Associated Press
BRAINTREE, Mass. (AP) _ The winning numbers in Saturday afternoon's drawing of the Massachusetts Lottery's "Numbers Midday" game were:
1-7-3-5
(one, seven, three, five)

text:
Karelian cadets came to visit the Rosguards
02 Nov 2019, 17:18 by Alexey Gromov

Pupils of the Karelian cadet corps named after Alexander Nevsky examined the station of the OMON. The soldiers showed the children weapons and talked about their service.

Eighth graders from the Karelian cadet corps came to visit riot police. According to the press service of the regional branch of the Russian Guard, such meetings are ongoing.
Riot policemen told the teenagers about their service, showed weapons and armor protection equipment that they use in the service. They also presented military equipment and answered questions of the cadets.

Eighth graders were able to put on a fighter’s body armor and hold small arms. The cadets delighted the fighters with how well they know the device of the Kalashnikov assault rifle. They quickly and easily disassembled and assembled the machine.
#Romon #Karelia #technique #cadets
